data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Iloilo, Philippines need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Iloilo, Philippines
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 953,300 believers in Iloilo and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 953,300 believers in Iloilo to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Iloilo to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Japanese people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Iloilo, Philippines a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Iloilo, Philippines so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Iloilo, Philippines to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

location.name: Iloilo
